title: 工业原创作者严厉警告！！！！！
author: tony300300
txt_content:
[RULES] Do NOT reveal source information!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        This announcement is directed at those people who prefer decompiling the SourceCode to discover every mechanic instead of just experimenting around:
You're free to do so, but revealing any sort of information gained by decompiling source code in the forum, blog or MCF will lead to an instant ban in this forum.
I will reveal background information of the mechanics over time (namely in the Q&A Thread), if you just drop in "x takes 56 ticks to do y" it eliminates the whole fun of the concept.
As well, please do not instantly put "Best design for crop x" templates everywhere, basing on information you found in the code.

I honestly hope people will hold back and instead mess around with the randomness of IC-Agriculture for their own fun :3

看在原作者的份上，请不要再互相转发关于杂交的方法指南，概率表。（这次工业原创作者火了）
如果你周边的人在转发或者是使用这一类物品，请给予解释并且劝其删除。
（真的，这个原来怎么有趣的杂交系统就被那群人给糟蹋了，那这个游戏还有什么意义呢！？那还不如把生存模式删掉，开作弊算了）

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content: 好吧曾经在贴吧看到有人试过反编译把概率弄出来了

嗷嗷嗷....不知是怎么回事....我只知道玩发电机个核弹....布吉岛有个杂交系统
....

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content: 我只知道那个其实杂交系统很浮云……

replies.author: q424344706
replies.txt_content: 嗯，作弊是不好的行为啊

replies.author: sylqiuyifeng
replies.txt_content:
其实杂交真的很麻烦……
一个搞不好就杂草蔓延
100次里面都不见得有1次出稀有作物……
鉴定1次要吞5000eu
然后光是杂交架都要巨量

replies.author: HCR08
replies.txt_content: 什么东西有杂交吗我怎么不知道

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 会对作者有什么影响么？

replies.author: 49pal
replies.txt_content: 虽然不知道说什么 但是貌似很厉害的样子！
